name: Eldric Thorne
summary: Age 42 — Former Royal Archivist. Knows too much about the Old Crown.
details: Eldric vanished after cataloguing the Black Ledger. His notes end abruptly, ink torn from the page as if scraped away.

name: Maelin of Ash
summary: Age unknown — Wandering chronicler. Writes names that should not exist.
details: Maelin has been sighted across multiple regions over decades, unchanged. Marginal notes appear in handwriting that does not match his own.
